name: Pandora's Run
description:
You are a Rabbit at an Animal Testing Facility who has become self aware and must use these newly aquired gifts to escape. Navigate the chaotic layout of the building's various floors to escape to freedom.

This game was developed for the GMTK2020 Game Jame over the course of 48 hours. It was made using RPG Maker VX but uses an assortment of modern tilesets and originally composed and mastered music. 

Will Kremer did the soundtrack, you can find his work here: 

https://soundcloud.com/marios-slaughterhouse

The remix for Lockdown was produced specifically for this game by Sirius Brink.  You can find his other music here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2GHFe8jf73iU0uhzHC3KBg
